profile: With professional, dedicated plumbing service to all major cities and surrounding areas in Alberta, and with some of the best plumbers in the industry, The Gentlemen Plumbers work hard to exceed your expectations and deliver quality. If you need a plumber, call us today for plumbing or heating issues, leaky sinks and faucets, clogged drains, toilet, bathtub and shower repairs, furnace cleaning and repairs, hot water tanks and tankless hot water heaters, furnace installation and maintenance, trenchless pipe repair, camera sewer inspection, and more! We have local branches in Calgary, Edmonton, Red Deer, Lethbridge, and Medicine Hat, with extended service all over Southern Alberta, including Camrose, Sherwood Park, St. Albert, Airdrie, High River, Crossfield, Carstairs, Olds, Innisfail, Wetaskiwin, Leduc, Lacombe, Okotoks, Nanton, Taber, Cardston, Didsbury, Brooks, Crowsnest Pass, Cochrane, Strathmore, Sundre, Three Hills, Ponoka, Fort Macleod, Pincher Creek, Bowden, Fort Saskatchewan, Chestermere, Sylvan Lake, Spruce Grove, and Stony Plain.

profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
We are the Furnace Family, Edmonton & Calary's 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed Lennox Premier Dealer. If your furnace or air conditioner needs to be repaired or replaced, we are available 24/7. The Furnace Family believes in traditional values, honest pricing and doing the job right the first time. 

The Furnace Family is a family owned HVAC company specializing in residential furnace replacement and service, air conditioning, indoor air quality and water heaters.

Why choose the Furnace Family?
 
-100% satisfaction guarantee
We do the job right the first time, our combined years’ experience results in the best installation possible.
 
-Family owned an operated.
Just as the name says, we are a family. We are proud of our work and our workforce they are like our family. We all work together to keep customers happy. 
 
-Superior customer service.
With our accreditation and A_ rating from the better business bureau as well as being a Premier Lennox dealer you know you can trust that your HVAC system is in good hands.
 
-For a greener tomorrow
We understand the importance of conservation and efficiency.  We recycle all cardboard, refrigerant, and metals.  You can be sure we are doing our part for the environment.
 
Maybe you don't want to shop every heating company in town and you don't have too. Let our family be the one you call to keep yours comfortable.

Please visit us at furnacefamily.com or call us at 780-4FAMILY.

***Furnace Family is now Offers AIR MILES® Reward Miles***

profile: We are a proud A+ member of the Better Business Bureau.  We clean, service and install all aspects of your mechanical system.  That includes your hot water tank, humidifier, air conditioning, dryer vent, fireplace and of course your furnace and duct system.  Call one of our outstanding team members today, for a free quote and allow us to become "your guy" from now on! Acclaimed Furnace Cleaning, Heating & Cooling is looking forward to help you with all of your ducting cleaning, or heating or air conditioning needs. Don't forget to ask us about the Alberta Energy Efficiency Rebate Program

Here at EAZY PEAZY Plumbing & Gas every job small or large has our top priority in quality & efficiency! We like to make a stressful situation or a home renovation as comfortable and "eazy" as possible! We want to build relationships with our clients and do future work for years to come. For any details or questions about our company or services please feel free to contact us anytime or have a look through our site! 

"We're #1 at fixing all your #2 problems!"

Thank you for your future business!
EAZY PEAZY Plumbing & Gas LTD.
(780)995-0040

www.eazypeazyplumbing.ca
